TITLE.TOP_SECTION: The first crypto advertising network in the market
TITLE.MIDDLE_SECTION: A-ADS provides alternative technologies for monetizing your traffic
DESCRIPTION.TOP_SECTION: Do you have your own website, blog, or online media? Become our partner and start earning on advertising right now!
DESCRIPTION.MIDDLE_SECTION.FIRST: In addition to the ability to sell ads on your website directly, you can also earn from the pool of our active advertisers.
DESCRIPTION.MIDDLE_SECTION.SECOND: Our advertising model doesn't limit your earningsby clicks and impressions, but expands it with advertisers' budgets they eager to spend on your website.
DESCRIPTION.BOTTOM_SECTION.LIST.FIRST: Simple HTML code embeddable in any website
DESCRIPTION.BOTTOM_SECTION.LIST.SECOND: We don't collect your users' personal data
DESCRIPTION.BOTTOM_SECTION.LIST.THIRD: Fixed and adaptive ad units sizes
DESCRIPTION.BOTTOM_SECTION.LIST.FOURTH: The ability to filter ads content by category
DESCRIPTION.CHART_DESCRIPTION: Your visitors can view stats and buy ads directly on your site. If they become advertisers, you will get 50% of our fees collected from them
